repairedDockerfile:
# Stage 1 - the build process

FROM node:16 AS build

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY yarn.lock .
COPY package.json .
COPY .eslintrc.json .
COPY packages/dapp/src ./packages/dapp/src
COPY packages/dapp/public ./packages/dapp/public
COPY packages/dapp/package.json ./packages/dapp/package.json
COPY packages/dapp/jsconfig.json ./packages/dapp/jsconfig.json
COPY packages/dapp/.eslintrc.json ./packages/dapp/.eslintrc.json

ARG REACT_APP_DEFAULT_BRIDGE_DIRECTION
ARG REACT_APP_ENABLED_BRIDGES
ARG REACT_APP_INFURA_ID
ARG REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_FALLBACK_GWEI
ARG REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SUPPLIER_URL
ARG REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SPEED_TYPE
ARG REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ARG REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_API_URL
ARG REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ARG REACT_APP_TITLE
ARG REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION
ARG REACT_APP_UI_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ARG REACT_APP_DEBUG_LOGS
ARG REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ARG REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_THRESHOLD_BLOCKS
ARG REACT_APP_XDAI_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_POA_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_SOKOL_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_MAINNET_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_KOVAN_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_BSC_RPC_URL
ARG REACT_APP_COINZILLA_API_KEY
ARG REACT_APP_OWLRACLE_API_KEY
ARG REACT_APP_SENTRY_DSN

ENV REACT_APP_DEFAULT_BRIDGE_DIRECTION $REACT_APP_DEFAULT_BRIDGE_DIRECTION
ENV REACT_APP_ENABLED_BRIDGES $REACT_APP_ENABLED_BRIDGES
ENV REACT_APP_INFURA_ID $REACT_APP_INFURA_ID
ENV REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_FALLBACK_GWEI $REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_FALLBACK_GWEI
ENV REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SUPPLIER_URL $REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SUPPLIER_URL
ENV REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SPEED_TYPE $REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_SPEED_TYPE
ENV REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL $REACT_APP_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ENV REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_API_URL $REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_API_URL
ENV REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL $REACT_APP_ETH_PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ENV REACT_APP_TITLE $REACT_APP_TITLE
ENV REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION $REACT_APP_DESCRIPTION
ENV REACT_APP_UI_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL $REACT_APP_UI_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ENV REACT_APP_DEBUG_LOGS $REACT_APP_DEBUG_LOGS
ENV REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_UPDATE_INTERVAL $REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_UPDATE_INTERVAL
ENV REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_THRESHOLD_BLOCKS $REACT_APP_GRAPH_HEALTH_THRESHOLD_BLOCKS
ENV REACT_APP_XDAI_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_XDAI_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_POA_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_POA_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_SOKOL_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_SOKOL_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_MAINNET_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_MAINNET_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_KOVAN_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_KOVAN_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_BSC_RPC_URL $REACT_APP_BSC_RPC_URL
ENV REACT_APP_COINZILLA_API_KEY $REACT_APP_COINZILLA_API_KEY
ENV REACT_APP_OWLRACLE_API_KEY $REACT_APP_OWLRACLE_API_KEY
ENV REACT_APP_SENTRY_DSN $REACT_APP_SENTRY_DSN

RUN yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn cache clean;

RUN yarn dapp:build

# Stage 2 - the production environment

FROM nginx:alpine

COPY ./nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf

WORKDIR /usr/share/nginx/html

RUN rm -rf ./*

COPY --from=build /usr/src/app/packages/dapp/build .

EXPOSE 3000

ENTRYPOINT ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
